questionText: In "Home Alone," what city is the McCallister family flying to for Christmas?
In "Elf," what is Buddy’s favorite food group?
In "The Santa Clause," what job does Scott Calvin have before becoming Santa?
In "The Grinch" (live-action), the Grinch lives on what mountain overlooking Whoville?
In "A Christmas Story," what prize does Ralphie win that worries his mom?
In "Frozen," who is the snowman who loves warm hugs?
In "Toy Story," what is the name of Andy’s cowboy doll?
In "Finding Nemo," what kind of fish is Nemo?
In "The Lion King," what is Simba’s father’s name?
In "Encanto," what is the Madrigal family’s magical home called?
Mariah Carey’s iconic holiday hit starts with the line “I don’t want a lot for…” what?
This British singer’s song “Last Christmas” is a holiday staple.
Taylor Swift’s fanbase is commonly called the “Swift…” what?
Beyoncé’s famous alter ego is “Sasha” what?
This band sings “Mr. Brightside.”
In "The Office" (US), who is the regional manager for most of the series?
“How you doin’?” is Joey’s catchphrase from what sitcom?
In "Stranger Things," what state is Hawkins located in?
In "The Simpsons," what is Homer’s favorite exclamation?
In "Parks and Recreation," what town does the show primarily take place in?
A “GIF” is typically pronounced with a hard G or soft G—either is debated—but it stands for Graphics what Format?
This short-form video app was formerly known as Musical.ly.
The phrase “I can has cheezburger?” is associated with what early meme animal?
What does “DM” commonly stand for on social media?
This streaming platform’s subscribers are often called “Prime” members.
In Monopoly, what is the highest-value property on the board?
In Mario Kart, what item gives you a speed boost on the track?
What color are the classic LEGO minifigure heads traditionally?
In chess, which piece can move in an L-shape?
In Scrabble, what letter tile is worth 10 points?
